title: Modern Sports Youth Tee
excerpt:
Say hello to your new favourite tee. A relaxed cut, side slit and rounded dropped-back hem combine for an ultra-comfortable fit that’s ready for whatever the day brings, while…


  
    Style: 846921_01
  
  
    Colour: Puma Black
  


Shipping and Returns

PRODUCT STORY

Say hello to your new favourite tee. A relaxed cut, side slit and rounded dropped-back hem combine for an ultra-comfortable fit that’s ready for whatever the day brings, while the miDori® bioWick finish and dryCELL moisture-wicking technology guarantee comfy all-day wear. A fun graphic print at the front will be a hit with young fashionistas, and best of all this tee uses recycled fibres, giving the look an eco-friendly edge.

FEATURES & BENEFITS


  
    Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA’s answers to reduce our environmental impact.
  
  
    dryCELL: PUMA’s designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable
  
  
    miDori®: Made with the bio-based finishing treatment miDori® bioWick.
  


DETAILS


  
    Relaxed fit
  
  
    Crew neck
  
  
    Side slit for customised comfort
  
  
    Rounded dropped-back hem
  
  
    PUMA Cat Logo graphic rubber print at chest
  


Material Information


  Shell: 80% polyester, 20% Modal


Care Instructions


  
    Do not iron print
  
  
    Wash with similar colours
  
  
    Use detergent for colours
  
  
    Wash and iron inside out
  
  
    Do not dry clean

title: CLOUDSPUN Marathon Women's Running Tee
excerpt:
PRODUCT STORY

Taking part in endurance sports doesn’t mean you have to compromise on comfort. Our CLOUDSPUN line presents athleticism at its most essential, demonstrating that for the serious runner impeccably engineered gear and uncompromising comfort count. Our CLOUDSPUN Marathon Running Tee is an innovative layer engineered with CLOUDSPUN and dryCELL technologies to keep you at the height of comfort from your first mile to your last.

FEATURES & BENEFITS


  
    CLOUDSPUN: PUMA’s ultra-soft, moisture-wicking fabric with four-way stretch for unrestricted range of motion and comfort
  
  
    dryCELL: PUMA’s designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable
  


DETAILS


  
    Regular fit
  
  
    Crew neck
  
  
    FlexVent breathable, elastic trim
  
  
    Strategically placed mesh to enhance breathability and provide ultimate ventilation
  
  
    Reflective design elements
  
  
    PUMA Cat Logo at left chest
  


Material Information


  
    Mesh: 82% polyester, 18% elastane
  
  
    Shell: 94% polyester, 6% elastane
  


Care Instructions


  
    Do not use fabric softener
  
  
    Do not iron print
  
  
    Use only mild detergent
  
  
    Wash and iron inside out
  
  
    Wash with similar colours

title: Red Bull Racing R-Cat Machina Motorsport Shoes
excerpt:
PRODUCT STORY

PUMA’s Red Bull Racing R-Cat Machina is a sleek new model packed full of energy. It features a synthetic upper with textile inserts for a smooth look and feel. The iconic Red Bull Racing logo at the tongue fuses with bold PUMA branding, like the PUMA Cat Logo at the toe and the PUMA Formstrip across the lateral side, to create a truly special design. Channel the spirit of the beloved Red Bull Racing family and step out in confidence.

Inspired by and designed after four-time All-Star, NBA Rookie of the Year, Houston Rockets alumni and Hall-of-Famer Ralph Sampson, these clean, classic, court-ready kicks combine sport style with modern urban fashion. title: Mid 4Keeps Graphic Training Bra
excerpt:
PRODUCT STORY

Dress yourself in fierce street-ready style from head to toe with our Mid 4Keeps Graphic Training Bra, a stylish answer to comfort and support. This high-performance bra features mid impact support with removable cups, stabilised shoulder straps with a racerback construction for unrestricted range of motion and an encased elastic bottom for an unrestrictive fit that moves with you.

FEATURES & BENEFITS


  Contains Recycled Material: Made with recycled fibres. One of PUMA’s answers to reduce its environmental impact.


DETAILS


  
    Stabilised shoulder straps with a racerback construction
  
  
    Mid impact support
  
  
    Encased elastic bottom band to enhance support
  
  
    Polyester and elastane

    Mesh: 87% polyester, 13% elastane
  
  
    Shell: 89% polyester, 11% elastane
  
  
    Front Inner Surface: 91% polyester, 9% elastane
  


Care Instructions


  
    Wash with similar colours
  
  
    Remove accessories before washing
  
  
    Do not use fabric softener
  
  
    Use only mild detergent
  
  
    Do not iron print
  
  
    Wash garment inside out

title: Moms Love Baby Milky Lotion 150ml | Hermo Online Beauty Shop Malaysia
excerpt:
The skin of babies is thinner than that of adults, and the stratum corneum is only about half that of adults. As a result, more water is lost from the skin than adults, and it dries easily, so the baby’s skin needs sufficient care.

Milky Lotion CS protects your baby’s skin by using the power of natural ingredients!

<Ingredients that protect baby’s skin>

● Amino acid-based ceramide ingredients enhance the barrier function of the skin.

● Contains marigold, chamomile, and glycyrrhizic acid derived from the herbal medicine king “licorice” to condition the skin.

● The natural vegetable oils and fats derived from olives, jojoba, and shea, which are easy to adapt to the skin and have a high protective effect, protect the skin firmly.

● Hyaluronic acid, white fungus polysaccharide, and glycerin, which have high moisturizing power, firmly moisturize dry skin.



● For whole body care such as baby's face and buttocks.

● It is also recommended as a moisturizing emulsion for moms.

● Can be used from 0 years old.

title: Moms Love Baby Adlay Lotion 200ml | Hermo Online Beauty Shop Malaysia
excerpt:
● A lotion containing Coix seed extract and aloe vera leaf extract that moisturizes and smoothes the texture of the skin. Keeping your skin fresh prevents rough skin due to dryness.

● A gentle, thick lotion is used to make it easier for moms to care for healthy babies who cannot stay still. It’s thick, but it’s smooth and moist and mysterious.

****

● Coix seed extract

An extract extracted from the seeds of Coix seeds (Yokuinin), a gramineous plant from Hokkaido. Contains sugars, amino acids, fatty acids, etc. as ingredients to moisturize the skin.

● Aloe vera leaf extract

An evergreen perennial plant belonging to the genus Aloe of the family Aloe, which has long been used to prevent cuts and burns. The aloe vera leaf extract used in this product is an extract extracted from aloe vera in Okinawa (Miyakojima), and can be expected to have moisturizing power due to the polysaccharides of aloe vera. In addition, a part of the sales of this raw material is donated to an NPO organization that is engaged in coral reef conservation activities in Okinawa, which leads to support for environmental conservation activities.

● A gentle, thick lotion is used to make it easier for moms to care for healthy babies who cannot stay still. It’s thick, but it’s smooth and moist and mysterious.

****

● Coix seed extract

An extract extracted from the seeds of Coix seeds (Yokuinin), a gramineous plant from Hokkaido. Contains sugars, amino acids, fatty acids, etc. as ingredients to moisturize the skin.

● Aloe vera leaf extract

An evergreen perennial plant belonging to the genus Aloe of the family Aloe, which has long been used to prevent cuts and burns. The aloe vera leaf extract used in this product is an extract extracted from aloe vera in Okinawa (Miyakojima), and can be expected to have moisturizing power due to the polysaccharides of aloe vera. In addition, a part of the sales of this raw material is donated to an NPO organization that is engaged in coral reef conservation activities in Okinawa, which leads to support for environmental conservation activities.
